AI Description: cmjob is a Python-based tool for computational materials science that aids in automating the submission of multiple jobs on high-performance computing clusters. It simplifies the process of handling multiple job submissions, tracking job statuses, and organizing job outputs.
Core Features: Automates Job Submissions On Hpc Clusters, Monitors Job Statuses, Organizes Job Outputs, Facilitates Management Of Multiple Computational Jobs
General Tags: Hpc, Computational Materials Science, Python Library
